lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Mildred Elson, (born 1921). Passed away March 30 of Delray Beach, FL; Lawrence, NY; and New York City. Loving wife and "bubbe dear" of Abby (pre-deceased) for 69 years. Beloved sister of Lillian Gladstone and the late Pearl Swersky. Adored mother of Larry (Megan Squier), Michael (Sandra), Ellen Levine Miller (Rick) and the late Jimmy. Cherished "grandma" of Yarrow (Ryan), Faith (Tate), Cedar (Steve), Dan, Rachel, Josh (Taemi), and Tracy. Great-grandmother of Zenya and Annika. Dynamic core of her extended "mishpocha" family. All will treasure our times together. May her memory be a blessing. Memorial contributions may be made to Federation of South Palm Beach County or Hillel Broward and Palm Beach County. Shiva at the Miller's home, April 3 from 4-9pm and April 4 from 2-5pm and 7-9pm. Service Sunday, April 3, 2016 at noon at Gutterman Memorial Chapel, Woodbury, NY. Burial follows at New Montefiore Cemetery, Pinelawn, NY. (516) 921-5757. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEVINE, MILDRED ELSON
